Set severity to 'major' as I always got this exception (ie. I looped on 
dialog "An error occured, see log for more details...") and I was obliged to 
_cancel_ my eclipse session...

I'll attach the complete log...

Created an attachment (id=8493)
All NPEs while looping on Error dialog...

I was launching an eclipse self-hosting workspace and set a breakpoint in 
method getOverrideIndicators of HierarchyOverrideIndicatorLabelDecorator.
When I reached this breakpoint I disabled it and resume. I think it's a this 
moment I got the exception (not completely sure to remember the exact scenario).
I'll try to reproduce it to be more precise on this...
